posts.post_title: Old Mill Addie Joss Portrait FOR SALE
posts.post_content:
Total PSA Pop of only 9. 

Similarly an Old Mill Waddell Port with the same pop just sold for $8,400 in an SGC 3 in the Fall REA Auction. 

Great Value if you are into this kind of thing...

$1950 shipped
